   18: 
   19: -module(eturnal_SUITE).
   20: -compile(export_all).
   21: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   22: 
   23: -type info() :: ct_suite:ct_info().
   24: -type config() :: ct_suite:ct_config().
   25: -type test_def() :: ct_suite:ct_test_def().
   26: -type test_name() :: ct_suite:ct_testname().
   27: -type group_def() :: ct_suite:ct_group_def().
   28: -type group_name() :: ct_suite:ct_groupname().
   29: 
   30: %% API.
   31: 
   32: -spec suite() -> [info()].
   33: suite() ->
   34:     [{timetrap, {seconds, 30}}].
   35: 
   36: -spec init_per_suite(config()) -> config().
   37: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   38:     Config.
   39: 
   40: -spec end_per_suite(config()) -> ok.
   41: end_per_suite(_Config) ->
   42:     ok.
   43: 
   44: -spec init_per_group(group_name(), config()) -> config().
   45: init_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   46:     Config.
   47: 
   48: -spec end_per_group(group_name(), config()) -> ok.
   49: end_per_group(_GroupName, _Config) ->
   50:     ok.
   51: 
   52: -ifdef(old_inet_backend).
   53: -spec init_per_testcase(test_name(), config()) -> config().
   54: init_per_testcase(start_eturnal, Config) ->
   55:     set_eturnal_env("eturnal-old-otp.yml", Config);
   56: init_per_testcase(stun_tcp_auto, _Config) ->
   57:     {skip, otp_version_unsupported};
   58: init_per_testcase(stun_tls_auto, _Config) ->
   59:     {skip, otp_version_unsupported};
   60: init_per_testcase(_TestCase, Config) ->
   61:     Config.
   62: -else.
   63: -spec init_per_testcase(test_name(), config()) -> config().
   64: init_per_testcase(start_eturnal, Config) ->
   65:     set_eturnal_env("eturnal-new-otp.yml", Config);
   66: init_per_testcase(_TestCase, Config) ->
   67:     Config.
   68: -endif.
   69: 
   70: -spec end_per_testcase(test_name(), config()) -> ok.
   71: end_per_testcase(_TestCase, _Config) ->
   72:     ok.
   73: 
   74: -spec groups() -> [group_def()].
   75: groups() ->
   76:     [].
   77: 
   78: -spec all() -> [test_def()] | {skip, term()}.
   79: all() ->
   80:     [start_eturnal,
   81:      check_info,
   82:      check_all_sessions,
   83:      check_user_sessions,
   84:      check_disconnect,
   85:      check_credentials,
   86:      check_loglevel,
   87:      check_version,
   88:      reload,
   89:      connect_tcp,
   90:      connect_tls,
   91:      turn_udp,
   92:      stun_udp,
   93:      stun_tcp,
   94:      stun_tls,
   95:      stun_tcp_auto,
   96:      stun_tls_auto,
   97:      stop_eturnal].
   98: 
   99: -spec start_eturnal(config()) -> any().
  100: start_eturnal(_Config) ->
  101:     ct:pal("Starting up eturnal"),
  102:     {ok, _} = application:ensure_all_started(eturnal).
  103: 
  104: -spec check_info(config()) -> any().
  105: check_info(_Config) ->
  106:     ct:pal("Checking eturnal statistics"),
  107:     {ok, Info} = eturnal_ctl:get_info(),
  108:     true = is_list(Info).
  109: 
  110: -spec check_all_sessions(config()) -> any().
  111: check_all_sessions(_Config) ->
  112:     ct:pal("Checking active TURN sessions"),
  113:     {ok, Sessions} = eturnal_ctl:get_sessions(),
  114:     true = is_list(Sessions).
  115: 
  116: -spec check_user_sessions(config()) -> any().
  117: check_user_sessions(_Config) ->
  118:     ct:pal("Checking active TURN sessions of user"),
  119:     {ok, Sessions} = eturnal_ctl:get_sessions("alice"),
  120:     true = is_list(Sessions).
  121: 
  122: -spec check_disconnect(config()) -> any().
  123: check_disconnect(_Config) ->
  124:     ct:pal("Checking disconnection of TURN user"),
  125:     {ok, Msg} = eturnal_ctl:disconnect("alice"),
  126:     true = is_list(Msg).
  127: 
  128: -spec check_credentials(config()) -> any().
  129: check_credentials(_Config) ->
  130:     Timestamp = "2009-10-30 11:00:00Z",
  131:     Username = 1256900400,
  132:     Password = "uEKlpcME7MNMMVRV8rUFPCTIFEs=",
  133:     ct:pal("Checking credentials valid until ~s", [Timestamp]),
  134:     {ok, Credentials} = eturnal_ctl:get_credentials(Timestamp, []),
  135:     {ok, [Username, Password], []} =
  136:         io_lib:fread("Username: ~u~~nPassword: ~s", Credentials),
  137:     lists:foreach(
  138:       fun(Lifetime) ->
  139:               ct:pal("Checking credentials valid for ~s", [Lifetime]),
  140:               {ok, Creds} = eturnal_ctl:get_credentials(Lifetime, "alice"),
  141:               {ok, [Time, Pass], []} =
  142:                   io_lib:fread("Username: ~u:alice~~nPassword: ~s", Creds),
  143:               {ok, Pass} =
  144:                   eturnal_ctl:get_password(integer_to_list(Time) ++ ":alice"),
  145:               true = erlang:system_time(second) + 86400 - Time < 5
  146:       end, ["86400", "86400s", "1440m", "24h", "1d"]).
  147: 
  148: -spec check_loglevel(config()) -> any().
  149: check_loglevel(_Config) ->
  150:     Level = "debug",
  151:     ct:pal("Setting log level to ~s", [Level]),
  152:     ok = eturnal_ctl:set_loglevel(list_to_atom(Level)),
  153:     ct:pal("Checking whether log level is set to ~s", [Level]),
  154:     {ok, Level} = eturnal_ctl:get_loglevel().
  155: 
  156: -spec check_version(config()) -> any().
  157: check_version(_Config) ->
  158:     ct:pal("Checking eturnal version"),
  159:     {ok, Version} = eturnal_ctl:get_version(),
  160:     match = re:run(Version, "^[0-9]+\\.[0-9]+\\.[0-9](\\+[0-9]+)?",
  161:                    [{capture, none}]).
  162: 
  163: -spec reload(config()) -> any().
  164: reload(_Config) ->
  165:     CertFile = <<"run/cert.pem">>,
  166:     ct:pal("Deleting TLS certificate"),
  167:     ok = file:delete(CertFile),
  168:     ct:pal("Reloading eturnal"),
  169:     ok = eturnal_ctl:reload(),
  170:     ct:pal("Checking whether new TLS certificate was created"),
  171:     {ok, _} = file:read_file_info(CertFile),
  172:     ct:pal("Reloading eturnal without changes"),
  173:     ok = eturnal_ctl:reload().
  174: 
  175: -spec connect_tcp(config()) -> any().
  176: connect_tcp(_Config) ->
  177:     Port = 34780,
  178:     ct:pal("Connecting to 127.0.0.1:~B (TCP)", [Port]),
  179:     {ok, Addr} = inet:parse_address("127.0.0.1"),
  180:     {ok, Sock} = gen_tcp:connect(Addr, Port, []),
  181:     ok = gen_tcp:close(Sock).
  182: 
  183: -spec connect_tls(config()) -> any().
  184: connect_tls(_Config) ->
  185:     Port = 53490,
  186:     ct:pal("Connecting to 127.0.0.1:~B (TLS)", [Port]),
  187:     {ok, Addr} = inet:parse_address("127.0.0.1"),
  188:     {ok, TCPSock} = gen_tcp:connect(Addr, Port, []),
  189:     {ok, TLSSock} = fast_tls:tcp_to_tls(TCPSock, [connect]),
  190:     ok = fast_tls:close(TLSSock).
  191: 
  192: -spec turn_udp(config()) -> any().
  193: turn_udp(_Config) ->
  194:     Port = 34780,
  195:     Username = <<"2145913200">>,
  196:     Password = <<"cLwpKS2/9bWHf+agUImD47PIXNE=">>,
  197:     Realm = <<"eturnal.net">>,
  198:     ct:pal("Allocating TURN relay on 127.0.0.1:~B (UDP)", [Port]),
  199:     {ok, Addr} = inet:parse_address("127.0.0.1"),
  200:     ok = stun_test:allocate_udp(Addr, Port, Username, Realm, Password).
  201: 
  202: -spec stun_udp(config()) -> any().
  203: stun_udp(_Config) ->
  204:     Port = 34780,
  205:     ct:pal("Performing STUN query against 127.0.0.1:~B (UDP)", [Port]),
  206:     {ok, Addr} = inet:parse_address("127.0.0.1"),
  207:     Result = stun_test:bind_udp(Addr, Port),
  208:     true = is_tuple(Result),
  209:     true = element(1, Result) =:= stun.
  210: 
  211: -spec stun_tcp(config()) -> any().
  212: stun_tcp(_Config) ->
  213:     Port = 34780,
  214:     ct:pal("Performing STUN query against 127.0.0.1:~B (TCP)", [Port]),
  215:     {ok, Addr} = inet:parse_address("127.0.0.1"),
  216:     Result = stun_test:bind_tcp(Addr, Port),
  217:     true = is_tuple(Result),
  218:     true = element(1, Result) =:= stun.
  219: 
  220: -spec stun_tls(config()) -> any().
  221: stun_tls(_Config) ->
  222:     Port = 53490,
  223:     ct:pal("Performing STUN query against 127.0.0.1:~B (TLS)", [Port]),
  224:     {ok, Addr} = inet:parse_address("127.0.0.1"),
  225:     Result = stun_test:bind_tls(Addr, Port),
  226:     true = is_tuple(Result),
  227:     true = element(1, Result) =:= stun.
  228: 
  229: -spec stun_tcp_auto(config()) -> any().
  230: stun_tcp_auto(_Config) ->
  231:     Port = 34781,
  232:     ct:pal("Performing STUN query against 127.0.0.1:~B (TCP)", [Port]),
  233:     {ok, Addr} = inet:parse_address("127.0.0.1"),
  234:     Result = stun_test:bind_tcp(Addr, Port),
  235:     true = is_tuple(Result),
  236:     true = element(1, Result) =:= stun.
  237: 
  238: -spec stun_tls_auto(config()) -> any().
  239: stun_tls_auto(_Config) ->
  240:     Port = 34781,
  241:     ct:pal("Performing STUN query against 127.0.0.1:~B (TLS)", [Port]),
  242:     {ok, Addr} = inet:parse_address("127.0.0.1"),
  243:     Result = stun_test:bind_tls(Addr, Port),
  244:     true = is_tuple(Result),
  245:     true = element(1, Result) =:= stun.
  246: 
  247: -spec stop_eturnal(config()) -> any().
  248: stop_eturnal(_Config) ->
  249:     ct:pal("Stopping eturnal"),
  250:     ok = application:stop(eturnal).
  251: 
  252: %% Internal functions.
  253: 
  254: -spec set_eturnal_env(file:filename_all(), config()) -> config().
  255: set_eturnal_env(ConfName, Config) ->
  256:     DataDir = ?config(data_dir, Config),
  257:     ConfFile = filename:join(DataDir, ConfName),
  258:     ok = application:set_env(conf, file, ConfFile),
  259:     ok = application:set_env(conf, on_fail, stop),
  260:     ok = application:set_env(eturnal, on_fail, exit),
  261:     Config.
